original_text: At the noise of the tumult the people fled; at the lifting up of thyself the nations were scattered.
korean_text: 요란한 소리로 말미암아 민족들이 도망하며 주께서 일어나심으로 말미암아 나라들이 흩어졌나이다

sentences.original_text: At the noise of the tumult the people fled
at the lifting up of thyself the nations were scattered
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 스스로 높일 때에 열국이 흩어졌느니라
